employee Epic training Decreased training time 57 increased end user satisfaction to 92 and created a collaborative relationship between corporate training and IT training teams Developed and trained both teams to work in SharePoint to reduce time spent to schedule end users implement improved workflow to eliminate redundancy and increase accuracy Created and led Epic training roster submission project to 99 accuracy IT Department Relocation Collaborated with facilities to redesign an existing facility to house corporate IT infrastructure and relocated 500 IT professionals from multiple
